actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 553 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to encourage more direct assimilation of skilled craftsmen and technicians into local vocational education systems and in-service training programs.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of Federal grants under the Higher Education Act of 1965 for programs designed to encourage skilled craftsmen and technicians to enter the teaching fields of vocational education and inservice training programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 553 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to encourage more direct assimilation of skilled craftsmen and technicians into local vocational education systems and in-service training programs.
